original_text: Then the king of Egypt said to the Hebrew midwives, one of whom was named Shiphrah and the other Puah,
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 히브리 산파 십브라라 하는 사람과 부아라 하는 사람에게 말하여

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Egypt said to the Hebrew midwives,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 애굽 왕이 히브리 산파들에게 말했습니다,

sentences.original_text: one of whom was named Shiphrah
